title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When attempting to view the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects (e.g. org.apache.ant), I encounter the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. Could you please provide an explanation of what this message means?
OB: When attempting to view the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects (e.g. org.apache.ant), I encounter the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars.
SR: 1. Open a binary project, such as org.apache.ant. 2. Navigate to the scoped type hierarchy view. 3. Observe the message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
